1.title: @Eat'ude
1.description: The aim of this UX/UI project was to create from scratch the design of a mobile application with the creation of personas, wireframes and prototypes.

2.title: Villa Petite Fleur
2.description: Design and layout of a showcase website for a holiday accomodation for mobile and desktop.

3.title: YUME
3.description: YUME is a full-stack project created during my semester in Japan. I wanted to develop a web application for couples and friends to get to know each other better through questions and quizzes. For the design, I wanted to create a calm atmosphere with pastel colors.

4.title: Cartography of cemetery Père Lachaise
4.description: The aim of this project is to give the Père Lachaise cemetery a new identity, inspired by the Pop Art movement, with a colourful and fun visual identity.

5.title: Badminton Event
5.description: Design of a poster for an event organised by my Badminton club. Made on Figma.
